full_text: Once upon a time, in a valley surrounded by emerald greens and whispering rivers, there hatched a baby dragon with scales that glowed like the dawn. This wasn’t any ordinary dragon; he was born under a shooting star, which bestowed upon him a very special gift – the power to bring good luck to all who were kind to him. A fantastic addition to any dragon enthusiast’s collection. The Dragon is a symbol of 2024 This knitting pattern includes detailed instructions, providing clear guidance on how to achieve the perfect dragon features. You’ll find a list of recommended materials and helpful tips to make your knitting experience as smooth as soaring through the skies. ABOUT PATTERN □ Stitch by stitch knitting pattern □ 2 in 1 - Knitted flat (2 needles) and Knitted in the round versions given □ Video Tutorials (stitches, assembling process) The video serves as a visual supplement for your project, providing additional support. □ Process Photos □ How To Assemble Instruction □ All yarn parameters are given so you can choose the yarn from your stash as well □ Tools recommendations □ Baby Dragon is approx. 20cm/7.8 inches tall. □ With this pattern you can make your very own dino! □ PATTERN LANGUAGE: English (US) □ Want to see more from me: my shop: https://www.etsy.com/shop/PolushkabunnyKnit □ If you’re eager to discover more of my countless ideas —you’re warmly invited to visit my Instagram gallery @polushkabunny.
